sn55.29:1.2: “yato kho, bhikkhave, ariyasavakassa imani panca bhayani verani vupasantani honti, imehi catuhi sotapattiyangehi samannagato hoti, ayancassa ariyo nayo pannaya sudittho hoti suppatividdho; so akankhamano attanava attanam byakareyya:
sn55.29:1.3: ‘khinanirayomhi khinatiracchanayoni khinapettivisayo khinapayaduggativinipato; sotapannohamasmi avinipatadhammo niyato sambodhiparayano’”ti.
